statements: SELECT * FROM PatientReadmission WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, admission_date, discharge_date FROM PatientReadmission WHERE readmission_reason = 'COVID-19';
SELECT * FROM PatientReadmission ORDER BY readmission_date DESC, admission_date ASC;
SELECT patient_id, admission_date, discharge_date, readmission_reason FROM PatientReadmission WHERE readmission_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_id, readmission_reason FROM PatientReadmission WHERE admission_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PatientReadmission WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_id, admission_date, discharge_date, readmission_date FROM PatientReadmission WHERE readmission_reason LIKE 'Heart%';
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id, admission_date FROM PatientReadmission ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, admission_date, discharge_date, readmission_date, readmission_reason FROM PatientReadmission WHERE readmission_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_id, admission_date, discharge_date, MAX(readmission_date) FROM PatientReadmission GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM patients ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE readmission_count > 3;
SELECT discharge_date, patient_name FROM patients WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM readmission_policies ORDER BY policy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE readmission_count >= 3 ORDER BY admission_date DESC
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM patients WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY patient_name
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM patients WHERE admission_date < discharge_date ORDER BY patient_id
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, readmission_count FROM patients WHERE readmission_count > 0 ORDER BY readmission_count DESC, admission_date
SELECT patient_id, readmission_count FROM patients WHERE readmission_count BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY patient_id
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM Patients WHERE admission_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, admission_date, discharge_date FROM Hospitalizations WHERE hospitalization_reason = 'COVID-19';
SELECT * FROM Readmissions WHERE readmission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date, reason FROM Patients JOIN Readmissions ON Patients.patient_id = Readmissions.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM Patients WHERE admission_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Hospitalizations.hospitalization_reason FROM Patients JOIN Hospitalizations ON Patients.patient_id = Hospitalizations.patient_id WHERE Hospitalizations.admission_date < '2021-06-01';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Hospitalizations.hospitalization_reason, Readmissions.reason FROM Patients JOIN Hospitalizations ON Patients.patient_id = Hospitalizations.patient_id JOIN Readmissions ON Patients.patient_id = Readmissions.patient_id WHERE Hospitalizations.admission_date < '2021-06-01' ORDER BY Patients.patient_name DESC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Hospitalizations.hospitalization_reason, Readmissions.reason FROM Patients LEFT JOIN Hospitalizations ON Patients.patient_id = Hospitalizations.patient_id LEFT JOIN Readmissions ON Patients.patient_id = Readmissions.patient_id WHERE Hospitalizations.hospitalization_id IS NOT NULL AND Readmissions.readmission_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY Patients.patient_name ASC, Hospitalizations.admission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM Patients WHERE admission_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, discharge_date FROM Patients ORDER BY discharge_date DESC;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM PostDischargePolicies;
SELECT * FROM Readmissions WHERE readmission_reason LIKE '%infection%';
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY admission_date DESC, patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM Patients WHERE admission_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY admission_date ASC;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Readmissions.readmission_date, Readmissions.readmission_reason FROM Patients JOIN Readmissions ON Patients.patient_id = Readmissions.patient_id WHERE Readmissions.readmission_reason LIKE '%infection%';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, PostDischargePolicies.policy_name, PostDischargePolicies.policy_description FROM Patients LEFT JOIN PostDischargePolicies ON Patients.patient_id = PostDischargePolicies.policy_id;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, ReadmissionRates.readmission_rate, ReadmissionRates.assessment_date FROM Patients JOIN ReadmissionRates ON Patients.patient_id = ReadmissionRates.readmission_id WHERE ReadmissionRates.readmission_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY ReadmissionRates.assessment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date FROM Patients ORDER BY admission_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Readmissions WHERE readmission_reason = 'Follow-up appointment';
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM Admissions WHERE admission_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC
SELECT * FROM Admissions WHERE admission_reason ILIKE '%surgery%'
SELECT patient_name, admission_reason FROM Patients INNER JOIN Admissions ON Patients.patient_id = Admissions.patient_id WHERE admission_date >= '2022-01-01' AND discharge_date < '2022-06-01'
SELECT patient_name, readmission_date FROM Patients INNER JOIN Readmissions ON Patients.patient_id = Readmissions.patient_id ORDER BY readmission_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM Policies LEFT JOIN PolicyAssignments ON Policies.policy_id = PolicyAssignments.policy_id
